snippet: Excerpts from an exclusive interview with I'll Have Another's trainer, Doug O'Neill, by Bob Costas on "Costas Tonight," which will air after Monday night's Stanley Cup Game 3 on NBC Sports Network.
abstract: Excerpts from an exclusive interview with I'll Have Another's trainer, Doug O'Neill, by Bob Costas on "Costas Tonight," which will air after Monday night's Stanley Cup Game 3 on NBC Sports Network.

headline.main: O'Neill to Speak About Violations on 'Costas Tonight'
